name: BOR_SolarBionicEye
label: solar eye
desc: An advanced artificial eye. With its biogel nerve-link, internal signal pre-processor, and wide-spectrum sensors, it is better than a biological eye in almost every way. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

name: BOR_SolarBionicArm
label: solar arm
desc: An advanced artificial arm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way.

name: BOR_SolarBionicLeg
label: solar leg
desc: An advanced artificial leg. With its biogel nerve-link, powerful mini-servos, and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological leg in almost every way.

name: BOR_SolarBionicSpine
label: solar spine
desc: An advanced artificial spine. A biogel nerve bundle runs down an articulated plasteel core, surrounded by a lattice-dust healing system. It matches the performance of a biological spine.

name: BOR_SolarBionicHeart
label: solar heart
desc: An advanced artificial heart. It has synthetic muscle fibers for a realistic heartbeat, plus a high-flow pump for rapid circulation during high stress. It is better than a biological heart in almost every way.

name: BOR_SolarBionicStomach
label: solar stomach
desc: An advanced artificial stomach with sensors and chemical synthesizers that efficiently digest nearly any energy-bearing foodstuff. A person with this has a much lower chance of getting food poisoning, and is immune to some stomach diseases. An integrated lattice-dust healing system automatically repairs any damage to the artificial organ. It is better than a biological stomach in almost every way.

name: BOR_SolarBionicEar
label: solar ear
desc: An advanced artificial ear implant. A collection of invisible subdermal microphones capture sound and transmit it to a biogel nerve interface that links directly with the auditory nerve. It's sensitive enough to hear a cat before you see it, can't be damaged by loud noise, and automatically tunes itself to pick out meaningful sounds in noisy environments.

name: BOR_SolarBionicTongue
label: solar tongue
desc: An artificial tongue replacement. Made of synthetic smooth-fibers and connected through a neurogel interface, it can match the performance of a natural tongue in speaking, eating, and tasting.

name: BOR_SolarBionicJaw
label: solar jaw
desc: An artificial jaw replacement. Made out of biosynthetic bone, with plasteel tooth replacements and a set of micro servomotors for the full range of motion.

name: BOR_QuasarBionicEye
label: quasar eye
desc: An advanced artificial eye. With its biogel nerve-link, internal signal pre-processor, and wide-spectrum sensors, it is better than a biological eye in almost every way. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

name: BOR_QuasarBionicArm
label: quasar arm
desc: An advanced artificial arm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way.

It's sensitive enough to hear a cat before you see it, can't be damaged by loud noise, and automatically tunes itself to pick out meaningful sounds in noisy environments.

desc: An artificial tongue replacement. Made of synthetic smooth-fibers and connected through a neurogel interface, it can match the performance of a natural tongue in speaking, eating, and tasting.

name: BOR_QuasarBionicJaw
label: quasar jaw
desc: An artificial jaw replacement. Made out of biosynthetic bone, with plasteel tooth replacements and a set of micro servomotors for the full range of motion.

name: BOR_TenebralAppendage
label: tenebral appendage template
desc: A template for appendages made from tenebrite. They take the shape of a needed organ.

name: BOR_TenebralOrgan
label: tenebral organ template
desc: A Tenebral-technology organ template, shapes itself into the needed organ.

name: BOR_NeutroniumRefinery
label: neutronium refinery tier 1
desc: A complex machine capable of refining Neutronium into everything.

name: BOR_NeutroniumRefinery_II
label: neutronium refinery tier 2
desc: A complex machine capable of refining Neutronium into everything.

name: BOR_NeutroniumRefinery_III
label: neutronium refinery tier 3
desc: A complex machine capable of refining Neutronium into everything.

name: BOR_NeutroniumPipe
label: neutronium pipe
desc: BOR_Sunsteel pipes designed to transport usable Neutronium

name: BOR_UndergroundNeutroniumPipe
label: hidden neutronium pipe
desc: Hidden Sunsteel pipes designed to transport usable Neutronium

name: BOR_NeutroniumValve
label: neutronium valve
desc: Switches Neutronium flow on/off.

name: BOR_NeutroniumTank
label: neutronium tank
desc: An industrial liquid storage tank meant for storing Neutronium delivered via Neutronium pipe network. Tanks can be designated to be siphoned for usable Neutronium as needed. If damaged even lightly the escaping fumes will very swiftly create a gaseous fireball, the size of the resulting explosion will depend on the amount stored within.

name: BOR_NeutroniumTap
label: neutronium tap
desc: A hopper-like storage basin meant to hold dispensed Neutronium from tanks periodically for use later.

name: BOR_NeutroniumDrain
label: neutronium drain
desc: A hopper-like storage basin meant to input Neutronium into the network, filling up connected tanks.

name: BOR_InfiniteNeutroniumGenerator
label: tenebral neutronium selfsustained generator
desc: Slowly generates neutronium from particulate matter in the air.

name: BOR_GameOfUrBoard
label: game-of-ur holoboard
desc: Dating from 2500BC, this exciting yet infuriating board game can be played by one or two people. This particular holoboard is enhanced with holograms making the game more engaging and challenging. It trains intellectual skills.

name: BOR_ChessTable
label: chess holotable
desc: The ancient game of kings. Fun for a few hours here and there, even playing alone. This is a very immersive holotable with various improvements to presentation, and animated pawns. It trains intellectual skills.\n\nThis building requires adjacent chairs or stools to use.

name: BOR_PokerTable
label: poker holotable
desc: A holographic table designed for playing gambling card games like poker. It's enhanced with holographic technology to improve the expierence. A great way to test your strategic skills and a bit of luck.\n\nThis building requires adjacent chairs or stools to use.

name: BOR_BilliardsTable
label: billiards holotable
desc: A holotable for playing a variety of billiards-type games. It trains shooting ability.

name: BOR_MegascreenTelevision_I
label: solarscreen television
desc: A huge, high-tech television. Gigantic, hyper-vibrant images almost leap out of the screen. Very entertaining. Picks up transmissions from ancient satellites and ubiquitous data cards.

name: BOR_Telescope_I
label: holotelescope
desc: A telescope for doing amateur astronomy. It's a relaxing hobby for a certain kind of person. Can only be used outdoors.

name: BOR_PC_I
label: solarite personal computer
desc: A high tech computer with utilizing an LCD monitor and better performance parts that are less prone to crashing. Gives a boost to learning after use.

name: BOR_Research_Unlocker_I
label: solarite self-computing mainframe
desc: Increases research speed when placed near hi-tech research bench and unlocks Solarite research projects. Each research bench can only use one Solarite self-computing mainframe.

name: BOR_ToolCabinet_I
label: holotool cabinet
desc: Increases work speed when placed near a workbench. One workbench can use up to three holocabinets.

name: BOR_SolarGeothermalPowerGenerator
label: solar geothermal generator
desc: This solar geothermal generator not only produces a lot of power, [DBH]but can also double as water generator.[/DBH]

name: BOR_Reactor_I
label: solarite reactor
desc: Produces power by consuming solarite fuel rods. Must be periodically refueled by hand.

name: BOR_Battery_I
label: solari battery
desc: Stores electricity for later use. Charged batteries explode when exposed to rain or fire.

name: BOR_Bench_I
label: sunsteel shaper
desc: A work station for assembling Sunsteel-based technology.

name: BOR_Forge_I
label: sunforge
desc: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.

name: BOR_MedicineBench_I
label: solar medical fabricator
desc: A work bench equipped with containers, heaters, and measurement devices for producing various drugs.

name: BOR_HydroponicsBasin_I
label: solar hydrobasin
desc: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.

name: BOR_MegascreenTelevision_II
label: quasarscreen television
desc: A huge, high-tech television. Gigantic, hyper-vibrant images almost leap out of the screen. Very entertaining. Picks up transmissions from ancient satellites and ubiquitous data cards.

desc: A telescope for doing amateur astronomy. It's a relaxing hobby for a certain kind of person. Can only be used outdoors.

name: BOR_Research_Unlocker_II

desc: Increases research speed when placed near hi-tech research bench and unlocks Solarite research projects. Each research bench can only use one Solarite self-computing mainframe.

name: BOR_ToolCabinet_II
label: tool kwaazbinet
desc: Increases work speed when placed near a workbench. One workbench can use up to four kwaazbinets.

name: BOR_Reactor_II
label: epsilon-class neutronium reactor
desc: Produces power by consuming neutronium. Must be fuelled via pipelines.

name: BOR_Battery_II

desc: Stores electricity for later use. Charged batteries explode when exposed to rain or fire.

desc: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.

desc: Produces power by existing.

desc: A work bench equipped with containers, heaters, and measurement devices for producing various drugs.

name: BOR_HydroponicsBasin_III
label: tenebral hydrogrower
desc: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.

name: BOR_Research_Unlocker_IV
label: umbral spire
desc: Increases research speed when placed near hi-tech research bench and unlocks Solarite research projects. Each research bench can only use one Solarite self-computing mainframe.

name: BOR_Reactor_IV
label: umbral reactor
desc: is power.

name: BOR_Bench_IV
label: umbral creation engine
desc: A work station for assembling whatever you want.

name: BOR_Forge_IV
label: umbral forge
desc: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.

name: BOR_Femtoclusters
label: femtoclusters
desc: An opaque apparatus filled with femtoscopic machines, clustered and waiting for an order. Container is made from picomachines and has neither a reader or an applicator. Picocluster contantly spreads and shrinks around the container, unnoticeable to naked eye; approaching user has their intentions read before they even lay eyes on the apparatus. Femtomachines are kept enclosed only because they have nowhere else to be and exit through the pores of the surrounding cluster when intent is understood.

name: BOR_Picoclusters
label: picoclusters
desc: An opaque apparatus filled with picoscopic machines, clustered and waiting for an order. The container only has a tiny hole on the bottom. Entire container is built by nanomachines, so a reader is unneeded. Picomachines exit through the hole when intent is understood. Typically used for installation.

name: BOR_Nanoclusters
label: nanoclusters
desc: An opaque apparatus filled with nanoscopic machines, clustered and waiting for an order. The container has an electronic reader on top and a needle-like applicator on the bottom. Electronic reader transmits intentions of the user into the nanocluster, and the applicator deploys them. Typically used for installation.

name: BOR_Solar_Apparel_FlakVest
label: solar flak vest
desc: A vest with sunsteel armor plates inserted on the chest and back. While quite effective at deflecting gunshots and stabbing attacks against the chest, it does nothing to protect the limbs.

name: BOR_Solar_Apparel_FlakPants
label: solar flak pants
desc: A pair of pants with solar armor plates sewn in. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable.

name: BOR_Solar_Apparel_FlakJacket
label: solar flak jacket
desc: A tough sunsteel fabric jacket with armor plates sewn in. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable.

name: BOR_Solar_Apparel_PowerArmor
label: solar marine armor
desc: A suit of solar powered armor. Layered sunsteel-weave plates are very effective at stopping attacks, with few vulnerable joint sections. Neuro-memetic assistors allow a human to wear the armor and still move easily.\n\nArmor like this is often used by rapid-incursion space marines.

name: BOR_Solar_Apparel_ArmorRecon
label: solar recon armor
desc: A suit of light partially-powered solar armor, designed to permit quick movement. Lightweight sunsteel-weave plates block attacks without compromising mobility, and neuro-memetic assistors in the lower body allow a human to wear the armor and still move easily.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial scout troops and glitterworld police forces.

name: BOR_Solar_Apparel_PowerArmorHelmet
label: solar marine helmet
desc: A solar marine armor helmet, with a built-in status computer and layered sunsteel-weave plates.\n\nArmor like this is often used by rapid-incursion space marines.

name: BOR_Solar_Apparel_ArmorHelmetRecon
label: solar recon helmet
desc: A solar armored helmet with a built-in status computer and a protective sunsteel-weave plate.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial scout troops or glitterworld police forces.

name: BOR_Aegis
label: aegis
desc: A drug for preventing infections before they take hold. Blocks malaria, sleeping sickness, plague. Must be taken every five days to remain effective.\n\nThis drug only prevents new infections. It does not cure existing infections - even those that are not yet discovered.

name: BOR_Sunlite
label: sunlite
desc: A refined powdery preparation of the Sunweave-based Chemicals drug. When snorted, it produces a rapid euphoric high, dramatically reduces the user's need for rest, and suppresses pain. Like all forms of Sunweavium , it is addictive, though it is not as addictive as the cruder flake.\n\nBecause of its high cost and refined appearance, many cultures associate yayo with degenerate wealth. Whether in the throneroom or the boardroom, many hare-brained policy schemes have been developed during yayo-fueled binge parties.

name: BOR_Trot
label: trot
desc: A synthetic performance-enhancing drug developed for space marines during the early days of interplanetary warfare. trot blocks pain, increases movement speed, and improves the user's melee and shooting abilities.\n\nThe military chemists who created it were never able to remove its addictiveness. Some saw this as a downside; others saw it as a benefit.

name: BOR_WideAWake
label: wide-a-wake
desc: A synthetic stimulant. Wide-a-wake fills the user's need for rest, allowing them to work for extended periods without getting tired. However, taking wide-a-wake runs the risk of developing an addiction.\n\nIn the most competitive universities and companies of many worlds, high-achievers are sometimes called 'wide-a-wakes' because of the association with this drug.

name: BOR_FuelRod
label: solarite fuel rod
desc: The solarite fuel rod.

name: BOR_Neutronium
label: neutronium
desc: An exotic form of matter composed of neutrons in tight gridlock. While naturally-occuring neutronium maintains this density through its own gravity, one must commit massive quantities of energy in order to form and maintain neutron matter planetside. On its own it is useless to you and dangerous to store, but alongside solar, quasar, and tenebral tech it can be used to transmute elements, synthesize goods, and equip armies. You can form neutronium into virtually anything!

name: BOR_Sunsteel
label: sunsteel
desc: An enhanced form of plasteel, saturated with superheavy nucleic matter. Plasteel's iconic molecular structure keeps these massive atoms from falling apart through the sheer strength of its bonds. Sunsteel is a strong material used to construct solar buildings and craft solar weapons.\n\nThe name "sunsteel" is derived from an old myth wherein the founders of the original Solarite Republic were given faulty flight commands by their onboard persona and flew through a star as it underwent supernova. Their hull's plasteel absorbed the star's raw, nuclear material, a combination that shielded these travellers from further harm. Manufacturing more of this new metal granted them an extreme edge over their neighbors, and the Solar Republic was born.

name: BOR_Sunweave
label: sunweave
desc: Nano-fibers woven into sheets molecule-by-molecule using specialized production mechanites. While it flexes freely most of the time, it stiffens to absorb blows as they land, and is incredibly difficult to break. The secrets of its production are known only to the most advanced glitterworld cultures.

name: BOR_MedicineI
label: solarite medicine
desc: A kit of advanced ultra-tech medical supplies, probably manufactured on a distant glitterworld. It contains advanced polymorphic drugs, nanite diagnostic and healing assisters, a mini-imager, and various multi-use tools.

name: BOR_Gun_Autopistol_TI
label: solar pistol
desc: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire.

name: BOR_Gun_ChainShotgun_TI
label: solar chain shotgun
desc: A magazine-fed fully automatic shotgun. It is even shorter-ranged than a typical shotgun, but is extraordinarily dangerous due to burst fire.

name: BOR_Gun_AssaultRifle_TI
label: solar assault rifle
desc: A general-purpose gas-operated assault rifle for field or urban combat. It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy.

name: BOR_Gun_SniperRifle_TI
label: solar sniper rifle
desc: An ancient design of precision sniper rifle. Bolt action. It has an exceptionally long range, great accuracy and good power. Because it's so unwieldy, other weapons outclass it at close range.

name: BOR_Quasar_Apparel_FlakVest
label: quasar flak vest
desc: A vest with quasar alloy armor plates inserted on the chest and back. While quite effective at deflecting gunshots and stabbing attacks against the chest, it does nothing to protect the limbs.

name: BOR_Quasar_Apparel_FlakPants
label: quasar flak pants
desc: A pair of pants with quasar armor plates sewn in. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable.

name: BOR_Quasar_Apparel_FlakJacket
label: quasar flak jacket
desc: A tough quasar alloy fabric jacket with armor plates sewn in. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable.

name: BOR_Quasar_Apparel_PowerArmor
label: quasar marine armor
desc: A suit of quasar powered armor. Layered quasar alloy-weave plates are very effective at stopping attacks, with few vulnerable joint sections. Neuro-memetic assistors allow a human to wear the armor and still move easily.\n\nArmor like this is often used by rapid-incursion space marines.

name: BOR_Quasar_Apparel_ArmorRecon
label: quasar recon armor
desc: A suit of light partially-powered quasar armor, designed to permit quick movement. Lightweight quasar alloy-weave plates block attacks without compromising mobility, and neuro-memetic assistors in the lower body allow a human to wear the armor and still move easily.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial scout troops and glitterworld police forces.

name: BOR_Quasar_Apparel_PowerArmorHelmet
label: quasar marine helmet
desc: A quasar marine armor helmet, with a built-in status computer and layered quasar alloy-weave plates.\n\nArmor like this is often used by rapid-incursion space marines.

name: BOR_Quasar_Apparel_ArmorHelmetRecon
label: quasar recon helmet
desc: A quasar armored helmet with a built-in status computer and a protective quasar alloy-weave plate.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial scout troops or glitterworld police forces.

name: BOR_Canter
label: canter
desc: A synthetic performance-enhancing drug developed for space marines during the early days of interplanetary warfare. canter blocks pain, increases movement speed, and improves the user's melee and shooting abilities.\n\nThe military chemists who created it were never able to remove its addictiveness. Some saw this as a downside; others saw it as a benefit.

name: BOR_Castra
label: castra
desc: A drug for preventing infections before they take hold. Blocks malaria, sleeping sickness, plague. Must be taken every five days to remain effective.\n\nThis drug only prevents new infections. It does not cure existing infections - even those that are not yet discovered.

name: BOR_Sleepquitin
label: sleepquitin
desc: A synthetic stimulant. sleepquitin fills the user's need for rest, allowing them to work for extended periods without getting tired. However, taking sleepquitin runs the risk of developing an addiction.\n\nIn the most competitive universities and companies of many worlds, high-achievers are sometimes called 'sleepquitins' because of the association with this drug.

name: BOR_Sunlight
label: sunlight
desc: A refined powdery preparation of the Sunweave-based Chemicals drug. When snorted, it produces a rapid euphoric high, dramatically reduces the user's need for rest, and suppresses pain. Like all forms of Sunweavium , it is addictive, though it is not as addictive as the cruder flake.\n\nBecause of its high cost and refined appearance, many cultures associate yayo with degenerate wealth. Whether in the throneroom or the boardroom, many hare-brained policy schemes have been developed during yayo-fueled binge parties.

name: BOR_QuasarAlloy
label: quasar alloy
desc: Advanced spacer tech structural material. Plasteel is extremely strong due to its unique molecular structure.

name: BOR_ComponentII
label: kwazaari universal part
desc: Advanced computing and energy-directing machinery, miniaturized and hardened for the most demanding applications.

name: BOR_QuasarAlloyWeave
label: quasarite weave
desc: Nano-fibers woven into sheets molecule-by-molecule using specialized production mechanites. name: BOR_Longsword

desc: The ancient weapon of kings, the longsword can be used for slashing or stabbing.

name: BOR_Gun_LMG_TII

desc: A gas-operated light machine gun. While it is somewhat unwieldy and inaccurate, its long bursts of fire are effective against groups of enemies.

desc: A tenebral armored helmet with a built-in status computer and a protective tenebrite-weave plate.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial scout troops or glitterworld police forces.

However, taking adreamoline runs the risk of developing an addiction.\n\nIn the most competitive universities and companies of many worlds, high-achievers are sometimes called 'adreamolines' because of the association with this drug.

name: BOR_Crewmates
label: crewmates
desc: A refined powdery preparation of the Sunweave-based Chemicals drug. When snorted, it produces a rapid euphoric high, dramatically reduces the user's need for rest, and suppresses pain. Like all forms of Sunweavium , it is addictive, though it is not as addictive as the cruder flake.\n\nBecause of its high cost and refined appearance, many cultures associate yayo with degenerate wealth. Whether in the throneroom or the boardroom, many hare-brained policy schemes have been developed during yayo-fueled binge parties.

name: BOR_Gallop
label: gallop
desc: A synthetic performance-enhancing drug developed for space marines during the early days of interplanetary warfare. gallop blocks pain, increases movement speed, and improves the user's melee and shooting abilities.\n\nThe military chemists who created it were never able to remove its addictiveness. Some saw this as a downside; others saw it as a benefit.

name: BOR_Pax
label: pax
desc: A drug for preventing infections before they take hold. Blocks malaria, sleeping sickness, plague. Must be taken every five days to remain effective.\n\nThis drug only prevents new infections. It does not cure existing infections - even those that are not yet discovered.

name: BOR_Tenebrite
label: tenebrite crystals
desc: Advanced spacer tech structural material. Plasteel is extremely strong due to its unique molecular structure.

name: BOR_ComponentIII
label: crystalline joints
desc: Advanced computing and energy-directing machinery, miniaturized and hardened for the most demanding applications.

name: BOR_MedicineIII
label: dark medicine
desc: A kit of advanced ultra-tech medical supplies, probably manufactured on a distant glitterworld. It contains advanced polymorphic drugs, nanite diagnostic and healing assisters, a mini-imager, and various multi-use tools.

name: BOR_Gun_Autopistol_TIII
label: tenebral pistol
desc: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire.

name: BOR_Gun_ChainShotgun_TIII
label: tenebral chain shotgun
desc: A magazine-fed fully automatic shotgun. It is even shorter-ranged than a typical shotgun, but is extraordinarily dangerous due to burst fire.

name: BOR_Gun_AssaultRifle_TIII
label: tenebral assault rifle
desc: A general-purpose gas-operated assault rifle for field or urban combat. It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy.

name: BOR_Gun_SniperRifle_TIII
label: tenebral sniper rifle
desc: An ancient design of precision sniper rifle. Bolt action. It has an exceptionally long range, great accuracy and good power. Because it's so unwieldy, other weapons outclass it at close range.
